game.name: Jetpack astronaut
game.shortDescription: Jetpack Astronaut - 2D indie game with arcade elements, made in stylized graphics.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Jetpack Astronaut - 2D indie game with arcade elements, made in stylized graphics.

reviewHighlights.text: Jetpack Astronaut is a lazy template flip, stamped out from the godawful Gamemaker Studio 2 game engine. It's a lame single button ripoff of Moon Land...
I bought this game on Steam with my money, my soul, and nothing but good intentions. I proceeded to beat it and the game crashed but I think that was...
